Summary: seen to much to type it was crazy... nothing of this earth...
divs: Sighting Detailsoutside We were watching the meteor storm I took notice to it because of its strange flight paths they were following. seen a total of 15 things that were unexplainable even with the shower but the ones that stood out the most were a group of 3 lights in a triangle formation moving in circles I ran and got witness or two and after 3 of us caught a view it got to far away to see.....
